mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance (emp_no, check_in_time, normal, late) VALUES ( #{emp_no}, curtime(), CASE WHEN #{start_time} >= CURTIME() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, CASE WHEN #{start_time} > CURTIME() THEN 0 ELSE 1 END )
mapper.update: update attendance set check_out_time = curtime(), work_hours = TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, check_in_time, CURTIME()) / 60, normal = CASE WHEN #{end_time} >= CURTIME() THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, early_leave = CASE WHEN #{end_time} > CURTIME() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END where emp_no = #{emp_no} and date = curdate();
